titles.title: Preserving Capitalism in America Amendment
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to prohibit the United States from owning stock in corporations.
Preserving Capitalism in America Amendment

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: Constitutional Amendment - Preserving Capitalism in America Amendment - Prohibits the United States from owning, subscribing to, or otherwise having any interest in the stock or equity of any company, association, or corporation, except for any investments through any pension funds.
